reviews.review: Entonces... Esa gente que pagamos el juego... A tomar por saco, no?

The game is good, but for fuck sake is it fucked. It sould have just stayed paid, now, i need to wait around 7 minutes to find a competitive match, even with a party of 5 players and all maps selected, and all 3 matches i had today the enemy team was smurfs. This game needs to go back to being paid otherwise i don't see it going a long way from now on. TL;DR: game is good, but takes horrendous ammounts of time to find competitive mathces and it's full of smurfs.

Es un juego bastante bueno y entretenido
Cosas malas a destacar aveces,te puede llegar a tocar con chiteros pero si tenes prime es muy poco probable ,ojo te puede llegar a tocar igual 
jugar con randoms aveces desvalora el juego ya que pueden tocar trolls o jugadores prepotentes que se creen mejores que nadie y juegan solos
muy divertido para jugar con amigos y para hacer amigos tambien,si bien la mayoria de las partidas te toca con gente bastante cerrada en alguna que otra partida te podes hacer amigos nuevos
Получил чудесный игровой опыт в 200 часов и убедился что игра говно, вальве разленились, пусть нюхают бебру
Really good game, only thing that they should improve is their anticheat/trust factor system
juego que no caduca, recomendable para unas risas con amigps

seçkin hesap olmanız önemli değil . Rankınız ne olursa olsun farketmiyor 10maçımın 8 tanesine hile geliyor. Hs yiyen bekle sen diyip hile açıyor valvenin hileye karşı koruması çok güçsüz başlamayın derim kanser olursunuz.
Good game, must buy (other wise hacker lobbies).  CSGO is a main stay in the fps community and will always be around.
Com certeza um dos melhores jogos de FPS gratuitos, gameplay e jogabilidade incomparáveis, além da comunidade ser bastante flexível. Recomendo !
I WAS HAKEN AND NEVAH CAUT! BOD GEIM! NO NAICLA!
Mechanics take a little to get used to but it's a very enjoyable game.

if u want to play this game start thinking about yourself cause this game is literally cheating simulator
i like the game i spend a lot of time at it surfing is one of my favourite things to do

10/10 would one hit again.

Classic game. Its mechanics are simple which allows for fair and equal play. Skill is important for competitive play, but you can also casually play with the bois.

very nice game but u have to focuse to cheaters in mm :p the best game ever :D

Valve just wants your money. The game is unbearable to play. The trust factor is a scam, no matter how much you play fair, there will always be someone with a hack and they do not make any effort to hide that they are using hack.
